entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:12 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 04:31 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -33.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: S 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 35.
